strings.inputsKBM:
[icon=keyW] [icon=keyA] [icon=keyS] [icon=keyD] to move
[icon=keySpace] to jump
[icon=keyR] to restart the level
[icon=keyP] to enter pause screen
strings.inputsTouch:
[b]TOUCH STICK ON THE LEFT[/b] to move
[b]TAP SCREEN[/b] to jump
[b]DRAG ON SCREEN[/b] to move the camera
strings.leftStick: touching the left side of the screen
strings.creditsText:
-skybox heavily modified from: https://opengameart.org/content/sky-box-sunny-day
-dash by qubodup-bounce by duckduckpony
-wind loop by nsstudios
-character vocals from Mont Blanc Candies

levelMessages.blueBox: Reach the Blue Box, move with {keyMove}
levelMessages.wallRun: Jump into the wall, while facing the wall, to start wallrunning
levelMessages.wallJump: Press Jump while wallrunning to jump off into the look direction
levelMessages.wallClimb: Run facing a wall to start climbing
levelMessages.Demo_End: Thank you for playing ! Stay tuned for updates :)
